element.short: NFDI4Health LM Nutritional Epidemiology Metadataschema (UC 5.1) V3.1
element.definition: NFDI4Health LogicalModel Nutritional Epidemiology Metadataschema (Use Case 5.1) V3.1
Group of items providing information on diet assessment.
element.comment: Cardinality: 1..*, if Resource.nutritionalData == 'Yes'; otherwise 0.. 0 / Additional Information: Filtering condition to decide if all following questions will be asked. / Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): no / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

element.definition: Which dietary assessment instrument is used in the [RESOURCE]?
element.comment: Short Input Help: Select one value from the list. / Display information? (Data capturing): yes / Display information? (Data visualization): yes / Source of the property and/or allowed values: NFDI4Health UC 5.1 requirements

constraint.human: Cardinality: 1..1, if DietAssessment.instrument == 'Food frequency questionnaire'; otherwise 0.. 0

element.definition: How many items were inquired with the FFQ?
